metadata.dc:author: Isla Pera, Pilar
metadata.dc:description: Diabetes Mellitus during infancy childhood or adolescence does not differ from adult diabetes mellitus in terms of basic principles nor therapeutic treatment methods but the characteristics patients have during those ages signify that diabetes has a special repercussion and becomes harder to treat in patients during those ages.
metadata.dc:title: Diabetes mellitus en el adolescente.
[Diabetes mellitus in teenagers].
